mapper.select:
select count(*) from hdg_battery_cell where 1 = 1
and cell_mfr LIKE concat('%',#{cellMfr}, '%')
and cell_model LIKE concat('%',#{cellModel}, '%')
and barcode LIKE concat('%',#{barcode}, '%')
and battery_id = #{batteryId}
select count(*) from hdg_battery_cell where create_time is null
select * from hdg_battery_cell where create_time is null limit ${beginIndex}, ${rows}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hdg_battery_cell( battery_id, cell_mfr, cell_model, barcode, nominal_cap, ac_resistance, resilience_vol, static_vol, circle, appearance, memo, operator, create_time ) VALUES ( #{batteryId}, #{cellMfr}, #{cellModel}, #{barcode}, #{nominalCap}, #{acResistance}, #{resilienceVol}, #{staticVol}, #{circle}, #{appearance}, #{memo}, #{operator}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: update hdg_battery_cell set nominal_cap = #{nominalCap}, ac_resistance = #{acResistance}, resilience_vol = #{resilienceVol}, static_vol = #{staticVol}, circle = #{circle}, appearance =#{appearance} where id = #{id}
